author: Rob Goldberg
title: Rams, Chargers' SoFi Stadium Trade Worker Tests Positive for Coronavirus
description: A SoFi Stadium construction worker has tested positive for the coronavirus, according to  Josh Peter  of  USA Today ...
content:
DANIEL SLIM/Getty Images
A SoFi Stadium construction worker has tested positive for the coronavirus, according to Josh Peter of USA Today.
"First and most importantly, the worker is doing well, receiving care and is recovering," Chris McFadden, the vice pre… [+1952 chars]
